t = int(input())
while t:
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (i, j, count) = (0, 0, 0)
    h = n // 2
    if n % 2 == 0:
        pass
    else:
        h += 1
    j = n - 1
    while i < j:
        if l[i] == l[j]:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        elif l[i] > l[j]:
            count += 1
            l[i] = l[i] - l[j]
            j -= 1
        else:
            count += 1
            l[j] = l[j] - l[i]
            i += 1
    print(count)
    t -= 1

from collections import deque
T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    arr = deque(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
    while len(arr) > 1:
        last = len(arr) - 1
        if arr[0] == arr[last]:
            arr.popleft()
            arr.pop()
        elif arr[0] > arr[last]:
            addleft = arr[0] - arr[last]
            arr.popleft()
            arr.pop()
            arr.appendleft(addleft)
            ans += 1
        elif arr[0] < arr[last]:
            addright = arr[last] - arr[0]
            arr.popleft()
            arr.pop()
            arr.append(addright)
            ans += 1
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = 0
    y = n - 1
    ans = 0
    while len(a) > 1:
        if a[0] == a[-1]:
            del a[0]
            del a[-1]
        elif a[0] < a[-1]:
            x = a[0]
            y = a[-1]
            del a[0]
            del a[-1]
            a.append(y - x)
            ans += 1
        else:
            a.reverse()
            x = a[0]
            y = a[-1]
            del a[0]
            del a[-1]
            a.append(y - x)
            a.reverse()
            ans += 1
    print(ans)

from collections import deque
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = deque(a)
    count = 0
    while len(a) != 0 and len(a) != 1:
        s1 = a.pop()
        s2 = a.popleft()
        if s2 > s1:
            a.appendleft(s2 - s1)
            count += 1
        elif s1 > s2:
            a.append(s1 - s2)
            count += 1
    print(count)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    size = int(input())
    arr = input()
    arr = [int(x) for x in arr.split()]
    count = 0
    f = 0
    l = len(arr) - 1
    while True:
        while arr[f] == arr[l] and f < l:
            f += 1
            l -= 1
        if f >= l:
            break
        if arr[f] < arr[l]:
            arr[l] = arr[l] - arr[f]
            f = f + 1
        else:
            arr[f] = arr[f] - arr[l]
            l = l - 1
        count += 1
    print(count)

t = int(input())
test = 0
while test < t:
    j = 0
    n = int(input())
    count = 0
    arr = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))[:n]
    length = len(arr)
    while length > 1:
        if arr[0] == arr[length - 1]:
            arr.pop(length - 1)
            length = len(arr)
            arr.pop(0)
            length = len(arr)
        elif arr[0] > arr[length - 1]:
            x = arr[length - 1]
            y = arr[0] - x
            arr.pop(0)
            length = len(arr)
            arr.insert(0, y)
            length = len(arr)
            arr.pop(length - 1)
            length = len(arr)
            count += 1
        else:
            y = arr[0]
            x = arr[length - 1] - y
            arr.pop(0)
            length = len(arr)
            arr.pop(length - 1)
            length = len(arr)
            arr.append(x)
            length = len(arr)
            count += 1
    print(count)
    test += 1

for i in range(int(input())):
    x = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    i = 0
    j = x - 1
    while i <= j:
        if l[i] == l[j]:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
            continue
        c += 1
        if l[i] > l[j]:
            k = l[i] - l[j]
            l[i] = k
            j -= 1
        else:
            k = l[j] - l[i]
            l[j] = k
            i += 1
    print(c)

            r = r - 1
            i = i + 1
    print(count)

n = int(input())

def pal(arr):
    x = 0
    (i, j) = (0, len(arr) - 1)
    while i <= j:
        if arr[i] == arr[j]:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        elif arr[i] > arr[j]:
            arr[i] -= arr[j]
            j -= 1
            x = x + 1
        else:
            arr[j] -= arr[i]
            i += 1
            x = x + 1
    return x
for i in range(n):
    length = int(input())
    li = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(pal(li))

from collections import deque
for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = deque(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0

    def pops():
        a.pop()
        a.popleft()
    while len(a) >= 2:
        if a[0] == a[-1]:
            pops()
        elif a[0] < a[-1]:
            ans = ans + 1
            s = a[-1] - a[0]
            pops()
            a.append(s)
        elif a[0] > a[-1]:
            ans = ans + 1
            s = a[0] - a[-1]
            pops()
            a.appendleft(s)
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
    count = 0
    for i in range(len(A)):
        N = len(A) - 1
        temp = 0
        if i == N - i:
            break
        if A[i] < A[N - i]:
            temp = A[N - i]
            A[N - i] = A[i]
            A.insert(N - i, temp - A[i])
            count += 1
        elif A[i] > A[N - i]:
            temp = A[i]
            A[i] = A[N - i]
            A.insert(i + 1, temp - A[N - i])
            count += 1
    print(count)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    input()
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    count = 0
    while len(l) > 1:
        if l[0] == l[-1]:
            l.pop(0)
            l.pop()
            count -= 1
        elif l[0] > l[-1]:
            l[0] -= l[-1]
            l.pop()
        else:
            l[-1] -= l[0]
            l.pop(0)
        count += 1
    print(count)

    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    low = 0
    high = n - 1
    count = 0
    while low < high:
        if arr[low] == arr[high]:
            low += 1
            high -= 1
        elif arr[low] > arr[high]:
            arr[low] = arr[low] - arr[high]
            high -= 1
            count += 1
        else:
            arr[high] = arr[high] - arr[low]
            low += 1
            count += 1
    print(count)
    testcase -= 1

T = int(input())
for i in range(0, T):
    N = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    while len(A) > 1:
        if A[0] == A[-1]:
            del A[0]
            del A[-1]
        elif A[0] > A[-1]:
            A[0] = A[0] - A[-1]
            del A[-1]
            c += 1
        else:
            A[-1] = A[-1] - A[0]
            del A[0]
            c += 1
    print(c)
